scripts.build-bundle: npm run clean-bundle && rollup aemi.module.js --file dist/bundle/aemi.min.js --format iife --name aemi && terser dist/bundle/aemi.min.js -o dist/bundle/aemi.min.js -c toplevel -m toplevel --ecma 2021
scripts.build-module: npm run clean-module && terser aemi.module.js -o dist/module/aemi.min.js -c toplevel -m toplevel --ecma 2021 && cp -r ./src ./dist/module/src && for script in ./dist/module/src/*.js; do terser $script -o $script -c toplevel -m toplevel --ecma 2021; done
scripts.build: npm run build-bundle && npm run build-module
